__e: I was just talking to May, and given the brutality of this crime, I'd like to assign an officer to you and your daughter, just to be safe, just for a few days, until we get a better handle on all of this.
You'll stay with Aunt May... and Uncle Ben for a little while.
You tried to kill Aunt May. You tried to kill Mary Jane.
When she got out of the car, and you saw her for the first time you grabbed me and said, "Aunt May, is that an angel?"
May took off on vacation and never came back, so I lost my right hand, too.
- It's an ancient forest, May Belle, full of magical creatures and friendly giants, anything you can imagine.
